title: FT/FS: Have 2 Lundgren Chicago Piedmont 350's. SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Have 2 Lundgren Chicago Piedmont 350's. SOLD
posts.post_content:
Ok, I have 2 examples of Lundgren Chicago with the very tough Piedmont 350 back.  I only need 1 and don't really care which. These are very tough to find with this back as stated in the Elite Eleven threads.

Looking to trade for EPDG's or HOFer upgrades.  

Pricing them at $290 and $190

Thanks......
